original: tiṣṭhantu tāvallaṅkādhipate ghaṭādayo bhāvā vicitralakṣaṇapatitā bālānāṃ na tvāryāṇām |

prabandha utpadaḥ lakṣaṇa utpādaḥ ca
dvividhā sthitiḥ prabandha sthitiḥ lakṣaṇa sthitiḥ ca

original: trividhaṃ vijñānaṃ pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ca |

analyzed: dvividham mahāmate vijñānam saṃkṣepeṇa aṣṭa lakṣaṇa uktam khyāti vijñānam vastu prativikalpa vijñānam ca
yathā mahāmate darpaṇasya rūpa grahaṇam
evam khyāti vijñānasya ākhyāsyati
khyāti vijñānam ca mahāmate vastu prativikalpa vijñānam ca
dve pi ete bhinna lakṣaṇe nyonya hetuke
tatra khyāti vijñānam mahāmate acintya vāsanā pariṇāma hetukam
vastu prativikalpa vijñānam ca mahāmate viṣaya vikalpa hetukam anādi kāla prapañca vāsanā hetukam ca

original: tatra sarvendriyavijñānanirodho mahāmate yaduta ālayavijñānasya abhūtaparikalpavāsanāvaicitryanirodhaḥ |

prabandha nirodhaḥ punar mahāmate yasmāt ca pravartate

an ālayavijñāna hetukāni syuḥ

ālayam hi tathā śuddham āśrayaḥ sarva dehinām
hiṅgu gandhaḥ palāṇḍuḥ ca garbhiṇyāḥ garbha darśanam
lavaṇa ādibhiḥ ca lāvaṇyam bīja vat kim na vartate

original: anyatve ca tadanyatve ubhayaṃ nobhaye tathā |
analyzed: anya tve ca tad anya tve ubhayam na ubhaye tathā

original: astitvaṃ nirupādānaṃ na ca nāsti na saṃskṛtam || 834 ||
analyzed: astitvam nirupādānam na ca na asti na saṃskṛtam
aśva vat vidyate hi ātmā skandhaiḥ go bhāva varjitam
saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtam vācyam avaktavyam svabhāvakam
yukti āgamābhyām durdṛṣṭyā tarka dṛṣṭyā malīkṛtam
anirdhāryam vadanti ātmā na upādāne na ca anyatas
doṣa nirdhāraṇā hi eṣām skandhena ātmā vibhāvyate

original: ekatvena tadanyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ || 837 ||
analyzed: ekatvena tad anyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ

original: darpaṇe udake netre yatha bimbaṃ pradṛśyate |
analyzed: darpaṇe udake netre bimbam pradṛśyate
ekatva anyatva rahitaḥ tathā skandheṣu pudgalaḥ

original: bhāvyaṃ vibhāvanādhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam |
analyzed: bhāvyam vibhāvanā dhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam
mucyante hi ku darśanaiḥ

original: dṛṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ yathā vidyuccakraṃ chidragṛhe yathā |
analyzed: dṛṣṭam naṣṭam yathā vidyut cakram chidra gṛhe yathā
pariṇāmaḥ sarva dharmāṇām bālaiḥ iva na kalpayet
bhāva abhāvena nirvāṇam bālānām citta mohanam
ārya darśana sadbhāvāt yathā avasthāna darśanāt
utpāda bhaṅga rahitam bhāva abhāva vivarjitam
tīrthya vāda vinirmuktam nāma saṃsthāna varjitam
adhyātma dṛṣṭi nilayam pariṇāmam vibhāvayet
saṃsparśa pīḍanābhyām vai devānām nārakāṇi ca
antarābhavikā na asti vijñānena pravartitā
jaraja aṇḍaja saṃsveda ādyāḥ antara ābhava saṃbhavāḥ
sattva kāyāḥ yathā citrāḥ gatyā agatyām vibhāvayet
tīrthya dṛṣṭi pralāpāni matimān na samācaret
ādau nirdhāryate ātmā upādānāt viśeṣayet
a nirdhārya vandhyā putram viśiṣyate
paśyāmi sattvān divyena prajñā māṃsa vivarjitam
saṃsāra skandha nirmuktam mūrtimān sarva dehinām
durvarṇa suvarṇa gatam muktāmukta viśeṣaṇam
divyam saṃskāra vigatam saṃskāra stham prapaśyate
mūrtimān gati saṃdhau vai tārkikāṇām agocaram
atikrānta mānuṣya gatim aham na anye ku tārkikāḥ
na asti ātmā jāyate cittam kasmāt etat pravartate
nadī dīpa bīja vat tasya nirgamaḥ kim na kathyate

original: anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñānādi na vidyate |
analyzed: anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñāna ādi na vidyate

original: tadabhāve na vijñānaṃ saṃtatyā jāyate katham || 852 ||
analyzed: tad abhāve na vijñānam saṃtatyā jāyate katham
adhva trayam anadhvaḥ ca avaktavyaḥ ca pañcamaḥ
jñeyam etat hi buddhānām tārkikaiḥ saṃprakīrtyate
a vaktavyaḥ ca saṃskāraiḥ jñānam saṃskāra hetukam
gṛhṇāti saṃskāra gatam jñānam saṃskāra śabditam
asmin sati idam bhavati pratyayāḥ ca api ahetukāḥ
vyañjakena upadiśyante tad abhāvāt na kārakam

original: pavanaṃ hi vahnerdahanaṃ preraṇe na tu saṃbhave |
analyzed: pavanam hi vahneḥ dahanam preraṇe na tu saṃbhave
prerya nirvāyate tena katham sattva prasādhakāḥ
saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtam vācyam upādāna vivarjitam
katham hi sādhakaḥ tasya vahniḥ bālaiḥ vikalpyate
anyonyasya bala ādhānāt vahniḥ vai jāyate nṛṇām
sattvaḥ pravartitaḥ kena vahni vat kalpyate yatas
skandha āyatana kadambasya manādi akāraṇaḥ nu vai
nairātmā sārthavat nityam cittena saha vartate
dvau etau bhāsvarau nityam kārya kāraṇa varjitau
agniḥ hi asādhakaḥ teṣām na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ

original: cittaṃ sattvāśca nirvāṇaṃ prakṛtyā bhāsurā nu vai |
analyzed: cittam sattvāḥ ca nirvāṇam prakṛtyā bhāsurāḥ nu vai
doṣaiḥ anādikaiḥ kliṣṭāḥ abhinnāḥ gagana upamāḥ
hasti śayyā ādi vat chāyā
stīrthya dṛṣṭyā malīkṛtāḥ
manaḥ vijñāna saṃchannāḥ agniḥ ādyaiḥ viśodhitāḥ

original: dṛṣṭāśca te yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kleśā vidāritāḥ |
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ ca te yathābhūtam dṛṣṭvā kleśāḥ vidāritāḥ
dṛṣṭānta gahanam hitvā gatāḥ te ārya gocaram
jñāna jñeya vibhāgena anya tvam kalpyate yatas

original: na ca budhyanti durmedhā avaktavyaśca kathyate || 864 ||
analyzed: na ca budhyanti durmedhāḥ avaktavyaḥ ca kathyate

original: bherī yathā candanajā bālaiḥ kurvanti nānyathā |
analyzed: bherī yathā candana jā bālaiḥ kurvanti na anyathā
candana agaru saṃkāśam tathā jñānam ku tārkikaiḥ
utthitaḥ khalu bhaktaḥ ca pātra saṃśrita mātrakam
doṣaiḥ mukha vikāra ādyaiḥ śuddham bhaktam samācaret
imam nayam yaḥ anuminoti yuktitaḥ
prasādavān yoga paraḥ hi akalpanaḥ
anāśritaḥ hi artha paraḥ bhavet asau
hiraṇmayīm dharma gatim pradīpayet
bhāva abhāva pratyaya moha kalpanā
kudṛṣṭi jālam sa malam hi tasya tu
sa rāga doṣa pratigham nivartate
nirañjanaḥ buddha karaiḥ ca sicyate
tīrthyā kāraṇa diś mūḍhāḥ anye pratyaya vihvalāḥ
anye ahetu sadbhāvāt ucchedam āryam āsthitāḥ
vipāka pariṇāmaḥ ca vijñānasya manasya ca
manaḥ hi ālaya saṃbhūtam vijñānam ca manaḥ bhavam
ālayāt sarva cittāni pravartanti taraṃga vat
vāsanā hetukāḥ sarve yathā pratyaya saṃbhavāḥ
kṣaṇa bheda saṃkalā baddhāḥ sva citta artha vigrāhiṇaḥ
saṃsthāna lakṣaṇa ākārāḥ manaḥ cakṣu ādi saṃbhavāḥ
anādi doṣa saṃbaddham artha abhāva āsana uditam
bahirdhā dṛśyate cittam tīrtha dṛṣṭi nivāraṇam
tad hetukam eva anyat tat ālambya pravartate
yadā saṃjāyate dṛṣṭiḥ saṃsāraḥ ca pravartate
māyā svapna nibhāḥ bhāvāḥ gandharvanagara upamāḥ
vṛtti bhedāt tu tathatā samyak jñānam tad āśrayam
māyā śūraṃgama ādīni samādhīni parāṇi ca
bhūmi praveśāt labhate abhijñāḥ vaśitāni ca
jñāna māyā upamam kāyam abhiṣiktam ca saugatam

original: nivartate yadā cittaṃ nivṛttaṃ paśyato jagat |
analyzed: nivartate yadā cittam nivṛttam paśyataḥ jagat

original: muditāṃ labhate bhūmiṃ buddhabhūmiṃ labhanti ca || 878 ||
analyzed: muditām labhate bhūmim buddha bhūmim labhanti ca
āśrayeṇa nivṛttena viśva rūpaḥ maṇiḥ yathā
karoti sattva kṛtyāni pratibimbam yathā jale
sat asat pakṣa nirmuktam ubhayam na ubhayam na ca
pratyeka śrāvakīyābhyām niṣkrāntā saptamī bhavet
pratyātma dṛṣṭa dharmāṇām bhūta bhūmi viśodhitam
bāhya tīrthya vinirmuktam mahāyānam vinirdiśet
parāvṛttiḥ vikalpasya cyuti nāśa vivarjitam
śaśa roma maṇi prakhyam muktānām deśayet nayam

original: yathā hi grantho granthena yuktyā yuktistathā yadi |
analyzed: yathā hi granthaḥ granthena yuktyā yuktiḥ tathā yadi
atas yuktiḥ bhavet yuktim anyathā tu na kalpayet

original: cakṣuḥ karma ca tṛṣṇā ca avidyāyoniśastathā |
analyzed: cakṣuḥ karma ca tṛṣṇā ca avidyā yoniśas tathā
cakṣuḥ ūrūpe manaḥ ca api āvilasya manaḥ tathā
iti ārya saddharmalaṅkāvatāraḥ nāma mahāyāna sūtram sa gāthakam samāptam iti

original: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ hetu prabhavāḥ hetum teṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat

original: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
analyzed: teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evam vādī mahā śramaṇaḥ
